```rst
logger.py
---------

This file provides the core logging functionalities. It offers a flexible logging interface for categorizing log messages by severity.

Supported Log Levels
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

- SUCCESS
- INFO
- ATTENTION
- WARNING
- DEBUG
- ERROR
- LONG_ERROR
- CRITICAL
- BELL


.. automodule:: logger
   :members:
   :undoc-members:
   :show-inheritance:
```

```rst
exceptions.py
-------------

This module defines custom exceptions for handling errors related to logging operations.  It provides clear and descriptive error handling to aid in identifying and rectifying issues.

.. automodule:: exceptions
   :members:
   :undoc-members:
   :show-inheritance:
```

```rst
beeper.py
---------

The Beeper module handles sound notifications, enabling the application to emit different sounds based on the logging level.  This is particularly useful in environments without visual monitoring.

.. automodule:: beeper
   :members:
   :undoc-members:
   :show-inheritance:
```
